turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hello, hello, can I get a chai latte, please?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hi there! Absolutely, I'd love to make you a chai latte. Would you prefer that with regular milk, or do you have another preference?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! And would you like that hot or iced today? It's always nice to have options, especially if it's a warm day!

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Student and AI (Transcript not available, Student would like a slice of cake and AI provided some options)

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Chocolate cake is fine. Thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great choice, chocolate cake it is! I’ll have that ready for you in just a moment. Do you have any preference for how sweet or spicy you like your chai latte? I can adjust it a bit if you like!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: This is normal. It's fine. And I want to ask, where's the restaurant? Where's the restaurant?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem, I'll keep it just as it is! And the restroom is right around the corner to your left. Just let me know if you need anything else while you're here!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Okay, thank you. Um, did you have, uh, when I buy a coffee, did you have a card to remember how I order? How to, uh, then you, when I get a 10, you can, uh, give me one Wolfberry.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Ah, you're talking about a loyalty card, right? Yes, we do have one!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Yes, that’s all I want, thank you.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! Enjoy your chai latte and that chocolate cake. Let me know if you need anything else, and have a wonderful day!
